# lourouxdb

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

lourouxdb is a set function to manage the Louroux Observatory database.

## Installation

You can install the development version of lourouxdb from [GitHub](https://github.com/LouisManiere/lourouxdb) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("LouisManiere/lourouxdb")
```
